content: To the Chief Musician.  of David the servant of the , who spoke to the  the words of this song on the day that the  delivered him from the hand of all his enemies and from the hand of Saul. And he said:
The  is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer;
My God, my strength, in whom I will trust;
My shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.
I will call upon the ,  to be praised;
So shall I be saved from my enemies.
